name: skull pipe
description: This is a hand-carved wooden smoking pipe in the shape of a skull. The bowl is the top of its head.

name: zombie pipe
description: This is a hand-carved wooden smoking pipe in the shape of a zombie. The bowl is the top of its head.

name: claw pipe
description: This is a hand-carved wooden smoking pipe in the shape of a claw. The bowl of the pipe is being held by the claw.

name: leaf pipe
description: This is a hand-carved wooden smoking pipe in the shape of leaves. The bowl of the pipe is made of interwoven leaf patterns.

name: frog pipe
description: This is a hand-carved wooden smoking pipe in the shape of a frog. The frog is facing the smoker, the bowl is its mouth.

name: wave pipe
description: This is a hand-carved wooden smoking pipe in the shape of crashing waves. The bowl and neck are made of swirling water shapes.

name: american pipe
description: This is a hand-carved wooden smoking pipe in the shape of a curling American flag. The bowl is in the center of the curled flag.

name: heart pipe
description: This is a hand-carved wooden smoking pipe in the shape of a Heart. The bowl is in the center of the heart, with the neck forming the thin part of the Heart.

name: heart pipe
description: This is a hand-carved wooden smoking pipe in the shape of a Pickle. The bowl is at one end of the pickle, with the mouthpiece on the other end.

name: flamingo pipe
description: This is a hand-carved wooden smoking pipe in the shape of a Flamingo. The bowl is in the flamingos back with the neck and head forming the stem and mouthpiece.

name: fire pipe
description: This is a hand-carved wooden smoking pipe in the shape of a flames. The bowl of the pipe is made of twisting fire shapes.

name: pipe necklace
description: This is a small hand-carved wooden smoking pipe. Its a simple chillum with a string through it so it can be worn as a necklace.

name: sodacan pipe
description: This is a makeshift pipe, made out of an old can.
